commit message: Reset version name and release notes

Add random game option to buddy collection
Fix changing collection status on the buddy collection
Use Buddy name instead of ID to retrieve details
Display the User/username in the buddy title bar
Refactor layout of the buddy activity

When a buddy doesn't exist, attempt to refresh
Buddy Preference now launches the activity instead of a link
Associated bug fixes

Correct the parsing of statistics
Display the non-Bayes average as the default
Ensure request interceptor isn't null before adding it to the REST adapter. (Reported in the Play store)

Fix problem displaying done/cancel actionbar on pre-v11 devices
Update release notes
Modify the class path in an attempt to avoid problems in the release build.
Correctly copy players with the play again option
Remove libraries from classpath so it will export in Release mode.
